content: Olen saanut nyt pari päivää palvelimelta fhirsandbox2-auth.kanta.fi virheen: "Error 500: java.lang.IllegalStateException: No WebApplicationContext found: no ContextLoaderListener or DispatcherServlet registered?" Onko jokin muuttunut, vai onko palvelin nurin?
This is working again now after the updates to the environment!

The authorization does not seem to work in fhirsandbox2-auth.kanta.fi. Namely, when I try to authorize my test service by giving etunimi, sukunimi and henkilötunnus, pressing Login button leads to ERR_CONNECTION_RESET.
Noted and this is due to our configurations. We'll inform here once this is fixed, sorry for the trouble.
The configurations have now been updated and I tested this myself and it now works.
